page.title: 20FARM FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Most of the families of{Capernwray either live on a farm, house or building that has been converted into a cottage or house.One family in this position are Elsie and Tony Askew. They are a brother and sister partnership who farm about 200 acres . They milk about 50{Fresian dairy cows and also have about 150{Swaledale sheep. Their house is common of the area, about{200 years old}and quite large. It has five bedrooms, bathroom and a toilet upstairs a big kitchen a living room and a large dining room downstairs. Because the house is so old the rooms are quite low so anyone above 6'2" would have to mind their head. CREDITS: MARGARET PARNHAM SUSAN SHAW
